Question
========
Test whether the mean grade on exam 1 (variable subject1) for students living at home [Live = 1] differs significantly from the mean of students no longer living at home [Live = 0]. Write the p-value found in the answer box (with 3 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-inferential_statistics-265-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-inferential_statistics-265-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 0.061.
